corporation?? Point, you can answer these folks without telling them 
anything... they can not say you did not cooperate or were combative or non 
compliant.. you answered all their questions in a timely fashion.. it may 
not be the answers they want, but you did answer... or, you can simply ask 
when you pull up, am I free to go or am I being detained?? If they say you 
are not free to go then ask again, am I being detained.. if so, do not talk 
to them at all, simply state, since i am under custodial arrest, I do not 
consent to any searches or seizures or destruction of myself or any of my 
property or effects, do not ask me any questions at all without a lawyer... 
and then do not speak another word... if they order you out of the 
automobile, if you have a key less entry put your keys in the glove box and 
get out and lock the doors... if they want into the automobile, they will 
have to break and enter to get into it...﻿
